name: smart-toc
description: an chrome extension that generates a table of content for webpage

scripts.start: export ENV=development && yarn run build:background && rollup --config rollup.config.js --watch
scripts.build: export ENV=production && yarn run clean; yarn run build:content && yarn run build:background && yarn run build:chrome && yarn run build:firefox
scripts.build:firefox: yarn run build:firefox:package && yarn run build:firefox:source
scripts.build:firefox:source: zip -r ./firefox/smart-toc_source.zip src package.json README.md tsconfig.json rollup.config.js yarn.lock

author: FallenMax@gmail.com
